statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_metrics ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, inventory_level FROM inventory_metrics WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT AVG(turnover_rate) AS avg_turnover_rate FROM inventory_metrics;
SELECT * FROM inventory_metrics WHERE profit_margin BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate, profit_margin FROM inventory_metrics WHERE inventory_level <= 20 ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_metrics ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, inventory_level FROM inventory_metrics WHERE inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY inventory_level ASC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_metrics WHERE turnover_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, profit_margin FROM inventory_metrics WHERE profit_margin <= 0.1 ORDER BY profit_margin ASC;
SELECT product_id, inventory_level, turnover_rate, profit_margin FROM inventory_metrics WHERE turnover_rate > 0.05 AND profit_margin > 0.1 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC, profit_margin ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, inventory_value FROM inventory ORDER BY inventory_value DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, profit_margin FROM sales WHERE profit_margin < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_value FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%' AND inventory_value > 500 ORDER BY inventory_value ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, profit_margin FROM inventory AS i JOIN sales AS s ON i.id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, profit_margin, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE profit_margin BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, stock_level, inventory_value, sale_date FROM inventory LEFT JOIN sales ON inventory.id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.profit_margin > 0.3 ORDER BY stock_level ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(turnover_rate) AS max_turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, location_id FROM stock_levels WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, profit_margin, date FROM profit_margins ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover JOIN stock_levels ON inventory_turnover.product_id = stock_levels.product_id WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY turnover_rate ASC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, location_id FROM stock_levels WHERE location_id = 3 AND last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, profit_margin FROM profit_margins WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY profit_margin DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_id, turnover_rate, profit_margin FROM inventory_turnover JOIN profit_margins ON inventory_turnover.product_id = profit_margins.product_id WHERE turnover_rate < 0.2 OR profit_margin > 0.3 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover
SELECT id, product_name FROM stock_levels ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_name, margin_percentage FROM profit_margin WHERE margin_percentage > 20
SELECT id, product_name, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE turnover_rate < 1.0
SELECT product_name, current_stock AS 'Stock Level' FROM stock_levels
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT it.product_name, pm.margin_percentage FROM inventory_turnover it JOIN profit_margin pm ON it.id = pm.id WHERE pm.margin_percentage > 10
SELECT it.product_name, sl.current_stock, pm.margin_percentage FROM inventory_turnover it JOIN stock_levels sl ON it.id = sl.id JOIN profit_margin pm ON it.id = pm.id WHERE sl.current_stock < 100

SELECT it.product_name, sl.current_stock, pm.margin_percentage FROM inventory_turnover it JOIN stock_levels sl ON it.id = sl.id JOIN profit_margin pm ON it.id = pm.id ORDER BY pm.margin_percentage DESC, sl.current_stock ASC

SELECT it.product_name AS product, sl.current_stock AS stock_level, pm.margin_percentage AS margin FROM inventory_turnover it JOIN stock_levels sl ON it.id = sl.id JOIN profit_margin pm ON it.id = pm.id WHERE it.product_name LIKE '%a%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level > 100
SELECT product_id, profit_margin FROM profit_margins WHERE profit_margin < 0.05
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_id, stock_level, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level > 1000
SELECT product_id, profit_margin, last_updated FROM profit_margins WHERE profit_margin BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_category, expense_date FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date
